entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH We have MORE PEOPLE than all but two other countries in the world! So, DUH. Yeah, we've tested more people than Monaco or Laos. Big deal. As a PERCENTAGE of the population, we're NINTH. https://t.co/4hLWtegDL2
